items: Added a dedicated Reset button that toggles RTS/DTR lines to restart connected devices without closing the serial port.
Main screen baud rate now has priority over Settings value, allowing quick changes without using the modal.
Automatically clears terminal output if the internal buffer exceeds 12,000 lines to maintain performance and responsiveness.
Icons for GitHub, Twitter, and other platforms are now included in the footer with official brand colors and external links.
Users are notified if Web Serial API is unsupported (now hidden by default).
Export current buffer as CSV or JSON via a modal interface with filename customization.
Replaced modal-based Info and Features with standalone responsive pages.
Dynamic loading of content from JSON for easier maintenance.
Full Dark/Light theme support across all pages.
Direct browser access to serial ports with full control over DTR/RTS.
Works only while the buffer is not full (under Max Lines). After that, scroll is always forced.
Only the most recent Max Lines will be copied or saved. Older data is removed from memory.
User-configurable signals with status indicators.
Pauses live data display. Incoming data is ignored during pause.
Adds real-time timestamp (12h or 24h) to each line if enabled.
Switch between Normal / Hex / JSON views for incoming data.
Inline search with results count.
When active and connected, clears the terminal after selected time interval.
